link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

form.name: form1

span.span: Good morning to our Sharpsville educational community. Governor Wolf has announced the closure of all schools in the Commonwealth for the remainder of the school year due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. We will continue to provide educational services through the District's Continuity of Education Plan that we are currently utilizing. As additional information becomes available we will provide those updates.

div.span: The mission of the Sharpsville Area School District is to provide a comprehensive education, which will meet the academic, social and emotional needs of all students to enable them to face future challenges.

img.title: football lights
img.alt: Show Your Support for our Senior Class!

div.a: Show Your Support for our Senior Class!

br.span: We are lighting up "The Pines" on May 4th, 2020 at 8:20pm. Click here for more info.
Please click here for answers to FAQs regarding COVID 19.

strong.span: Please click here for an important message regarding graduation.

div.a: Schools to Remain Closed through the Remainder of the 2019-2020 Academic Year

span.div: Please click here for an important message.

span.style: color: #262626; font-family: Roboto, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px

span.span: As required by PDE we have developed a Continuity of Education Plan that will guide us during the school closure. Please click here.

img.title: Sick
img.alt: Should I Send My Child To School?

div.a: Should I Send My Child To School?
Maxine Schell sinks 3-pointer on senior night -- crowd goes wild.

span.span: Sharpsville High School teacher Mrs. Springer had a chance to sit down with Senior Maxine Schell, to talk about the big game against Grove City this past Wednesday night.

br.span: Please click here for more information.

span.span: Transportation for the 2019-2020 school year is provided for students in the Sharpsville Area School District per the attached bus routes and stops.
